Text: ERI financials Cc Kim Attached are ERI Investments Incs financials Noresco will be the signatory to the contracts and ERI Investments Inc will guarantee the transaction Please send copies of Enrons contracts and Form of Guarantee to Tony Aguiar at and myself Thank you Phil Glaessner Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday September AM To Cc Subject FW eri financials Here is the info you needed JJR Original Message From Murphy Kerri Sent Wednesday September AM To Rizzo John Mannherz David Subject eri financials erifindecpdf spltrpdf Kerri Murphy Administrative Manager NORESCO One Research Drive Suite C Westborough MA phone fax erifindecpdf spltrpdf

RE Noresco LLCKim Thanks for sending the contract to us I have forwarded it to Norescos attorney We will be back to you for refreshed pricing tomorrow or the next day If you plan to be out of the office let me know the best way to reach you Regards Phil Glaessner Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston mailtoKim NRONcom Sent Tuesday September PM To Subject FW Noresco LLC Phil Attached is a draft Natural Gas PurchaseSale Agreement My apologies for taking so much time I hope it is not too late Please call me with any questions and if we need to I can get credit on the phone Thanks Kim Ward Manager West Gas Origination Original Message From Perlingiere Debra Sent Tuesday September PM To Ward Kim S Houston Subject Noresco LLC Kim here is your draft for Noresco Call me if you have any questions I realize the name is wrong on the file I will change this it is correct in the contract dp Morescodoc Debra Perlingiere Enron North America Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas nron Fax This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
